amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide for an automatic continuing resolution to take effect in the event that the regular appropriations process is incomplete at the start of a new fiscal year.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 106-613 to provide for an automatic continuing resolution in the event that the regular appropriations process is incomplete at the start of a new fiscal year.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gekas amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 236 (Roll no. 187).
